title: Landing Page Animation Load
description: Verify the landing page components animate smoothly using GSAP and Lenis on supported browsers.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL on a supported browser
Check that GSAP and Lenis animations trigger and complete without stutter
Verify smooth scrolling behavior is functional

title: User Signup Success
description: Ensure user can successfully sign up with valid information and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to Signup page
Input valid user details (email, password, etc.)
Submit signup form
Check signup confirmation is displayed
Verify user record is created in backend database

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Validate user login flow authenticates with correct credentials and JWT is stored.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Enter valid registered email and password
Submit login form
Check that login succeeds and JWT token is received and stored in session context
Verify user is redirected to appropriate dashboard based on role

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails when invalid credentials are submitted and proper error messages display.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Enter invalid email or password
Submit login form
Verify login rejection with relevant error message
Ensure no JWT token is stored

title: User Dashboard Data Live Update
description: Check that the user dashboard dynamically updates live bookings and personal data without page reload.

steps.description: Login as a user with active bookings
Verify dashboard displays current booking stats and personal data
Simulate a new booking or booking cancellation via backend or another client
Check dashboard reflects updates in near real-time without manual refresh

title: Admin Dashboard Metrics Display
description: Verify admin dashboard displays global metrics such as revenue, user statistics, and event statuses accurately.

steps.description: Login as an admin
Check that global revenue, active users, and other key metrics are displayed correctly
Trigger new event creation or user registration
Confirm metrics update dynamically reflecting new data

title: Event Booking Workflow Success
description: Test that a user can browse events, select an event, and complete a booking with real-time availability validation.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to Events Gallery
Select an event with available slots
Attempt to book the event
Verify availability check passes before booking is confirmed
Check booking success confirmation and update to user dashboard

title: Event Booking Failure on Full Capacity
description: Ensure that booking fails with proper feedback if the event is fully booked during the booking attempt.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to Events Gallery and select an event at full capacity
Attempt to book the event
Verify booking is rejected with clear message about unavailability
Ensure no booking entry is created in the backend

title: Admin Event Management Operations
description: Test admin can create, approve, and delete events and changes reflect in the system and UI.

steps.description: Login as admin
Create a new event with valid details
Verify new event appears in upcoming events list
Approve a pending event
Check event status is updated and visible accordingly
Delete an event
Verify event is removed from all relevant listings and database

title: Support Issue Submission and Admin Response
description: Verify users can submit support issues and admins respond, with responses visible immediately to users.

steps.description: Login as a user and navigate to support page
Submit a new support issue with detailed description
Confirm issue is saved and appears in user's support history
Login as admin and open issues management tab
Respond to the submitted support issue
Verify user receives response in realtime without page reload

title: Background Job Execution and Notification Triggering
description: Test background cron jobs run periodically every 5 seconds triggering welcome messages and system monitoring as expected.

steps.description: Deploy system and monitor background job execution logs
Confirm cron jobs execute every 5 seconds without failure
Verify welcome messages are sent to new users automatically
Check system monitoring alerts or notifications are triggered upon defined conditions

title: JWT Authentication Security Enforcement
description: Ensure JWT tokens are used to protect API routes and encryption of user credentials is verified.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected API endpoint without JWT token
Verify access is denied with authorization error
Login to obtain JWT token and use it to access protected endpoints
Confirm data transactions succeed with authorized token
Inspect stored user passwords in backend database
Check passwords are stored as encrypted hashes, not plaintext

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users and admins have role-based access, ensuring users cannot access admin functions and vice versa.

steps.description: Login as a regular user and attempt to access Admin Dashboard URL directly
Verify access is denied and user is redirected or shown unauthorized message
Login as an admin and attempt to access User-only pages
Verify admin has access or is redirected appropriately based on design
